Text: Is this one narrated by David Attenborough or Oprah Winfrey?
david attenborough is the shit, fuck oprah

Now on day 4 of downloading and only at 51.5%.  Watched the first disc though, gotta love the slo-mo shots of the praying mantis getting nailed in the head by the chameleons' tongue....i laughed so hard.
Can anyone tell me NTSC or PAL?

I'm guessing its PAL because of the dutch subtitles, which really sucks because ive yet to find an NTSC version out there. 

Thanks for uploading this, but seriously i hate to sound like a dick NLUPPER but its not that hard to put NTSC or PAL or even the damn region code.
I have download it but i do not have the sound any suggestion!
plz disregard my comment as there is sound i was wondering  where i can find the sound track in english as well

why would anyone want any dvd in NTSC instead of PAL? both the resolution, AND the colors are way better on PAL dvd's... remember: ntsc stands for Never The Same Color, whereas PAL stands for Perfectly Adjusted Levels ;)

stop crying about ntsc or pal or dvd's

you need to see this in HD :)
